blocks.subject: New Book Names
text: Mary, Enron Canada has 2 offices, one in Calgary and one in Toronto.  The
Toronto office was established to participate in all aspects of Enron
Canada's business, but principally, power trading, marketing and origination
after the de-regulation (or "market opening") of the Ontario power markets,
anticipated for the 2nd or 3rd quarter of 2001.
In response to your specific questions:
1. The Toronto office will be engaged in all aspects of trading, including
financial trading.  As with the Calgary office, it is my understanding that
all financial trading documentation will be handled as follows:
(a) financial master agreements (ISDA) and related collateral
annexes/guarantees/certificates/etc. will be negotiated and documented by
Houston Legal out of the Houston office under the supervision of Mark Taylor
and yourself;
(b) financial transaction documentation (i.e., confirmation
letters/GTCs/etc.) will be documented out of the Calgary office by Enron
Canada Operations/Documentation, under the supervision of Enron Canada Legal
where applicable;
(c) physical masters and related documentation will be negotiated and
documented out of the Calgary or Toronto office by Calgary/Toronto Legal, as
applicable, under my supervision; and
(d) all transaction documentation will be documented out of the Enron Canada
Documentation/Operations Group, under the supervision of Enron Canada Legal,
as appropriate.
2. All Canadian lawyers, including Chris Gaffney, report to me.  However,
Chris Gaffney has responsibility for legal matters regularly affecting the
Toronto office.  Therefore, you can co-ordinate directly with Chris, but
please keep me advised.  Chris regularly updates me with respect to Toronto
office matters.
Regards,
Peter
MARY COOK

blocks.subject: Toronto Office
text: Peter, the credit group in Houston has advised that the Toronto office may
begin entering into the financial trading arena.  Can you advise me on the
following:
1.  What are the current commercial plans for the Toronto office regarding
financial trading?
2.  I understand Chris Gaffney is the attorney in the Toronto office.  Does
he report into you? If the answer to 1 is yes, should I coordinate matters
with Chris directly or through you?
Thanks.  Give me a call when you get a chance.  Mary
Cordially,
Mary Cook
Enron North America Corp.
1400 Smith, 38th Floor, Legal
Houston, Texas   77002-7361
mary.cook@enron.com
